field.label: Interfaces
field.help: Select the interface to listen to. Set to none if you want to choose the interface via ntopng UI.

field.label: Connect to nProbe
field.help: This will collect traffic information from the local nProbe instance (requires the installation of the nProbe plugin).

field.label: HTTP Port
field.help: HTTP Port this service listens on.

field.label: HTTPS Port
field.help: HTTPS Port this service listens on. If you enable HTTPS you will be redirected from HTTP to HTTPS. Please select a certificate below

field.label: Certificate
field.help: Set the certificate to use for HTTPS connections.

field.label: License Key
field.help: License key for activating ntopng Enterprise.

field.label: Community Mode
field.help: This will run ntopng in Community mode, a license is not required in this mode.
